1: וִֽירִיחוֹ֙ <sup>3405 </sup> <n>Now Jericho</n> סֹגֶ֣רֶת <sup>5462 </sup> <n>was straitly</n> וּמְסֻגֶּ֔רֶת <sup>5462 </sup> <n>shut up</n> מִפְּנֵ֖י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>because</n> בְּנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of the children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> אֵ֥ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>no</n> יוֹצֵ֖א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>none went out</n> וְאֵ֥ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>one</n> בָּֽא׃ <sup>935 </sup> <n>and none came in</n> ס
2: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>And the LORD</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <sup>3091 </sup> <n>unto Joshua</n> רְאֵה֙ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>See</n> נָתַ֣תִּי <sup>5414 </sup> <n>I have given</n> בְיָֽדְךָ֔ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>into thine hand</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יְרִיח֖וֹ <sup>3405 </sup> <n>Jericho</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> מַלְכָּ֑הּ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>and the king</n> גִּבּוֹרֵ֖י <sup>1368 </sup> <n>thereof [and] the mighty men</n> הֶחָֽיִל׃ <sup>2428 </sup> <n>of valour</n>

17: וְהָיְתָ֨ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> הָעִ֥יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>And the city</n> חֵ֛רֶם <sup>2764 </sup> <n>shall be accursed</n> הִ֥יא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>it</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> בָּ֖הּ לַֽיהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>[even] it and all that [are] therein to the LORD</n> רַק֩ <sup>7535 </sup> <n>but</n> רָחָ֨ב <sup>7343 </sup> <n>only Rahab</n> הַזּוֹנָ֜ה <sup>2181 </sup> <n>the harlot</n> תִּֽחְיֶ֗ה <sup>2421 </sup> <n>shall live</n> הִ֚יא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>whom</n> אִתָּ֣הּ <sup>854 </sup> <n>her in</n> בַּבַּ֔יִת <sup>1004 </sup> <n>she and all that [are] with her in the house</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>because</n> הֶחְבְּאַ֔תָה <sup>2244 </sup> <n>because she hid</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַמַּלְאָכִ֖ים <sup>4397 </sup> <n>the messengers</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>whom</n> שָׁלָֽחְנוּ׃ <sup>7971 </sup> <n>that we sent</n>
18: וְרַק־ <sup>7535 </sup> <n>And ye in any wise</n> אַתֶּם֙ <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> שִׁמְר֣וּ <sup>8104 </sup> <n>keep</n> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>some</n> הַחֵ֔רֶם <sup>2764 </sup> <n>[yourselves] from the accursed thing</n> פֶּֽן־ <sup>6435 </sup> <n>so</n> תַּחֲרִ֖ימוּ <sup>2763 </sup> <n>lest ye make [yourselves] accursed</n> וּלְקַחְתֶּ֣ם <sup>3947 </sup> <n>when ye take</n> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>some</n> הַחֵ֑רֶם <sup>2764 </sup> <n>of the accursed thing</n> וְשַׂמְתֶּ֞ם <sup>7760 </sup> <n>and make</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> מַחֲנֵ֤ה <sup>4264 </sup> <n>the camp</n> יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> לְחֵ֔רֶם <sup>2764 </sup> <n>a curse</n> וַעֲכַרְתֶּ֖ם <sup>5916 </sup> <n>and trouble</n> אוֹתֽוֹ׃ <sup>853 </sup>
19: וְכֹ֣ל ׀ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> כֶּ֣סֶף <sup>3701 </sup> <n>But all the silver</n> וְזָהָ֗ב <sup>2091 </sup> <n>and gold</n> וּכְלֵ֤י <sup>3627 </sup> <n>and vessels</n> נְחֹ֙שֶׁת֙ <sup>5178 </sup> <n>of brass</n> וּבַרְזֶ֔ל <sup>1270 </sup> <n>and iron</n> קֹ֥דֶשׁ <sup>6944 </sup> <n>[are] consecrated</n> ה֖וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> לַֽיהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>unto the LORD</n> אוֹצַ֥ר <sup>214 </sup> <n>into the treasury</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> יָבֽוֹא׃ <sup>935 </sup> <n>they shall come</n>
20: וַיָּ֣רַע <sup>7321 </sup> <n>shouted</n> הָעָ֔ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>So the people</n> וַֽיִּתְקְע֖וּ <sup>8628 </sup> <n>when [the priests] blew</n> בַּשֹּֽׁפָר֑וֹת <sup>7782 </sup> <n>with the trumpets</n> וַיְהִי֩ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> כִשְׁמֹ֨עַ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>heard</n> הָעָ֜ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>and it came to pass when the people</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> ק֣וֹל <sup>6963 </sup> <n>the sound</n> הַשּׁוֹפָ֗ר <sup>7782 </sup> <n>of the trumpet</n> וַיָּרִ֤יעוּ <sup>7321 </sup> <n>shouted</n> הָעָם֙ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>and the people</n> תְּרוּעָ֣ה <sup>8643 </sup> <n>shout</n> גְדוֹלָ֔ה <sup>1419 </sup> <n>with a great</n> וַתִּפֹּ֨ל <sup>5307 </sup> <n>fell down flat</n> הַֽחוֹמָ֜ה <sup>2346 </sup> <n>that the wall</n> תַּחְתֶּ֗יהָ <sup>8478 </sup> <n>flat</n> וַיַּ֨עַל <sup>5927 </sup> <n>went up</n> הָעָ֤ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>so that the people</n> הָעִ֙ירָה֙ <sup>5892 </sup> <n>into the city</n> אִ֣ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>every man</n> נֶגְדּ֔וֹ <sup>5048 </sup> <n>straight</n> וַֽיִּלְכְּד֖וּ <sup>3920 </sup> <n>straight before him and they took</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָעִֽיר׃ <sup>5892 </sup> <n>the city</n>
21: וַֽיַּחֲרִ֙ימוּ֙ <sup>2763 </sup> <n>And they utterly destroyed</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>everything</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>it</n> בָּעִ֔יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>all that [was] in the city</n> מֵאִישׁ֙ <sup>376 </sup> <n>both man</n> וְעַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> אִשָּׁ֔ה <sup>802 </sup> <n>and woman</n> מִנַּ֖עַר <sup>5288 </sup> <n>young</n> וְעַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> זָקֵ֑ן <sup>2205 </sup> <n>and old</n> וְעַ֨ד <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> שׁ֥וֹר <sup>7794 </sup> <n>and ox</n> וָשֶׂ֛ה <sup>7716 </sup> <n>and sheep</n> וַחֲמ֖וֹר <sup>2543 </sup> <n>and ass</n> לְפִי־ <sup>6310 </sup> <n>with the edge</n> חָֽרֶב׃ <sup>2719 </sup> <n>of the sword</n>
22: וְלִשְׁנַ֨יִם <sup>8147 </sup> <n>unto the two</n> הָאֲנָשִׁ֜ים <sup>582 </sup> <n>men</n> הַֽמְרַגְּלִ֤ים <sup>7270 </sup> <n>that had spied out</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <sup>776 </sup> <n>the country</n> אָמַ֣ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>had said</n> יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <sup>3091 </sup> <n>But Joshua</n> בֹּ֖אוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>Go</n> בֵּית־ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>house</n> הָאִשָּׁ֣ה <sup>802 </sup> <n>thence the woman</n> הַזּוֹנָ֑ה <sup>2181 </sup> <n>into the harlot's</n> וְהוֹצִ֨יאוּ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>and bring out</n> מִשָּׁ֤ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>of there</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָֽאִשָּׁה֙ <sup>802 </sup> <n>the woman</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> לָ֔הּ כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>you</n> נִשְׁבַּעְתֶּ֖ם <sup>7650 </sup> <n>and all that she hath as ye sware</n> לָֽהּ׃
23: וַיָּבֹ֜אוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>went in</n> הַנְּעָרִ֣ים <sup>5288 </sup> <n>And the young men</n> הַֽמְרַגְּלִ֗ים <sup>7270 </sup> <n>that were spies</n> וַיֹּצִ֡יאוּ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>and brought out</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> רָ֠חָב <sup>7343 </sup> <n>Rahab</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אָבִ֨יהָ <sup>1 </sup> <n>and her father</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אִמָּ֤הּ <sup>517 </sup> <n>and her mother</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אַחֶ֙יהָ֙ <sup>251 </sup> <n>and her brethren</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> לָ֔הּ וְאֵ֥ת <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> מִשְׁפְּחוֹתֶ֖יהָ <sup>4940 </sup> <n>all her kindred</n> הוֹצִ֑יאוּ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>and all that she had and they brought out</n> וַיַּ֨נִּיח֔וּם <sup>3240 </sup> <n>and left</n> מִח֖וּץ <sup>2351 </sup> <n>them without</n> לְמַחֲנֵ֥ה <sup>4264 </sup> <n>the camp</n> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n>
24: וְהָעִ֛יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>the city</n> שָׂרְפ֥וּ <sup>8313 </sup> <n>And they burnt</n> בָאֵ֖שׁ <sup>784 </sup> <n>with fire</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> בָּ֑הּ רַ֣ק ׀ <sup>7535 </sup> <n>but</n> הַכֶּ֣סֶף <sup>3701 </sup> <n>and all that [was] therein only the silver</n> וְהַזָּהָ֗ב <sup>2091 </sup> <n>and the gold</n> וּכְלֵ֤י <sup>3627 </sup> <n>and the vessels</n> הַנְּחֹ֙שֶׁת֙ <sup>5178 </sup> <n>of brass</n> וְהַבַּרְזֶ֔ל <sup>1270 </sup> <n>and of iron</n> נָתְנ֖וּ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>they put</n> אוֹצַ֥ר <sup>214 </sup> <n>into the treasury</n> בֵּית־ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>of the house</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n>
25: וְֽאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> רָחָ֣ב <sup>7343 </sup> <n>Rahab</n> הַ֠זּוֹנָה <sup>2181 </sup> <n>the harlot</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בֵּ֨ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>household</n> אָבִ֤יהָ <sup>1 </sup> <n>and her father's</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>whom</n> לָהּ֙ הֶחֱיָ֣ה <sup>2421 </sup> <n>alive</n> יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <sup>3091 </sup> <n>And Joshua</n> וַתֵּ֙שֶׁב֙ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>and all that she had and she dwelleth</n> בְּקֶ֣רֶב <sup>7130 </sup> <n>in</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>Israel</n> עַ֖ד <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> הַיּ֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>[even] unto this day</n> הַזֶּ֑ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>to this</n> כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> הֶחְבִּ֙יאָה֙ <sup>2244 </sup> <n>because she hid</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַמַּלְאָכִ֔ים <sup>4397 </sup> <n>the messengers</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>whom</n> שָׁלַ֥ח <sup>7971 </sup> <n>sent</n> יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <sup>3091 </sup> <n>which Joshua</n> לְרַגֵּ֥ל <sup>7270 </sup> <n>to spy out</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יְרִיחֽוֹ׃ <sup>3405 </sup> <n>Jericho</n> פ
26: וַיַּשְׁבַּ֣ע <sup>7650 </sup> <n>adjured</n> יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <sup>3091 </sup> <n>And Joshua</n> בָּעֵ֥ת <sup>6256 </sup> <n>[them] at that time</n> הַהִ֖יא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> לֵאמֹ֑ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> אָר֨וּר <sup>779 </sup> <n>Cursed</n> הָאִ֜ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>[be] the man</n> לִפְנֵ֣י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> יְהוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> אֲשֶׁ֤ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> יָקוּם֙ <sup>6965 </sup> <n>that riseth up</n> וּבָנָ֞ה <sup>1129 </sup> <n>and buildeth</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָעִ֤יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>this city</n> הַזֹּאת֙ <sup>2063 </sup> <n>likewise</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יְרִיח֔וֹ <sup>3405 </sup> <n>Jericho</n> בִּבְכֹר֣וֹ <sup>1060 </sup> <n>thereof in his firstborn</n> יְיַסְּדֶ֔נָּה <sup>3245 </sup> <n>he shall lay the foundation</n> וּבִצְעִיר֖וֹ <sup>6810 </sup> <n>and in his youngest</n> יַצִּ֥יב <sup>5324 </sup> <n>[son] shall he set up</n> דְּלָתֶֽיהָ׃ <sup>1817 </sup> <n>the gates</n>
27: וַיְהִ֥י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>So the LORD</n> אֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>was with</n> יְהוֹשֻׁ֑עַ <sup>3091 </sup> <n>was with Joshua</n> וַיְהִ֥י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> שָׁמְע֖וֹ <sup>8089 </sup> <n>and his fame</n> בְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <sup>776 </sup> <n>was [noised] throughout all the country</n>
